skills.desc: Places a 60% [Increase DEF] buff on all allies for 3 turns, then attacks 1 enemy. Has a 75% chance of placing a [Stun] debuff for 1 turn. Has a 75% chance of placing a [Stun] debuff for 2 turns instead if the target is under two or more buffs.

Attacks all enemies. Has a 50% chance of placing a [Provoke] debuff for 1 turn.
